name: NFL Tour
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) This game supports English only. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". You are the star of the NFL's traveling summer road show in NFL Tour!  This is a hard-hitting, high-flying, pulse-pounding game of 7-on-7 football under the night lights and fireworks of some of America's most beautiful cities.  Take complete control over the game as you lower your shoulder and plow through defenders, drag tacklers and perform special reversal maneuvers.  Unleash the full fury of your defensive unit and overwhelm your opponent with the SMASH meter.  This is football the way you always wanted to play it -- NFL Tour! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
